description: How many time do software companies spend for software maintenance? From design to the refactoring of existing code? Don't you feel that it would be more useful to throw all that code away? During this talk we are going to try to apply the Martin Fowler's Sacrificial Architecture in the modern web development ecosystem in order to make our frontend code easy to rewrite for every new feature.
